title: End-to-end Streaming AI Chat with SSE
description: Added real-time token-by-token streaming for AI chat with robust SSE route, provider service, and client integration. Includes heartbeat, named events, rate limiting, and error handling.
items: Server: /api/ai/chat/stream with init/token/progress/done/error/ping events
Client: EventSource with named event listeners and fallback parser
Provider: Enhanced AI service simulating chunks with realistic delays
UI: ResearchAssistant integrates streaming with proper state and recovery

title: Multi-format Document Extraction (Production-Ready)
description: Built a comprehensive extraction system for PDF, DOCX, PPTX, CSV, images, and TXT with progress, metadata, OCR, and multiple output formats.
items: API: /api/extract and /api/extract-simple
Extractors: pdf-parse, mammoth, papaparse, Tesseract.js, XML parsing
UI: /extract and /extraction-demo with progress and exports
Architecture: BaseExtractor, Orchestrator, AI-powered analysis hooks

title: Unified Multi-Source Search (Google, DDG, Tavily, Context7, LangSearch)
description: Introduced a unified search service with weighted result merging, deduplication, fallbacks, and specialized methods for scholar/news/docs.
items: Services: Google, DuckDuckGo, Tavily, Context7 MCP, LangSearch
Deep Research integrates all available sources
Robust error handling and intelligent result merging

title: Literature Search: 75% Faster TypeScript Implementation
description: Replaced Python flow with parallel TS service calling OpenAlex, arXiv, CrossRef with caching, rate limits, dedupe, ranking, and retries.
items: Endpoint: /api/literature-search with cache-first and Retry-After
Hook: useLiteratureSearch with debouncing, aggregation support
UI: Real-time search with analytics tracking and saved papers
Supabase: literature_cache, usage tables, RLS policies

title: Writer: LaTeX Editor Upgrade
description: Converted Writer from Markdown to LaTeX with real-time preview, KaTeX rendering, toolbar, shortcuts, and collaboration.
items: Component: latex-editor with split/full views and status bar
AI prompts updated to output LaTeX fragments
Literature review produces LaTeX comparison tables

title: Research Assistant: Sources, Reasoning, Tools, Tasks, Actions
description: Integrated complete AI elements into per-message UI with faster streaming, better revert handling, and inline citations.
items: Sources panel above responses with link extraction
Reasoning panel per message during streaming
Tool usage detection with I/O display and badges
Collapsible tasks and actionable items with copy

title: AI Models & Presets Updated
description: Refreshed model lists across OpenAI, Anthropic, Gemini, Groq, Mistral; aligned presets and improved system prompts.
items: Models: gpt-4o(-mini), o3(-mini), claude-3.5*, gemini 1.5/2.5, llama 3.1/3.3, mixtral, etc.
Presets tuned with sensible temps and add-ons
SSE client events aligned with server

title: Planner & Notifications Improvements
description: Better calendar parsing and a new notifications preferences API with GET/PUT/POST support and sane fallbacks.
items: Planner: robust due_date parsing via date-fns, UI cleanups
API: /api/collaborate/notification-preferences with auth
Fallbacks for read status across mark-all/delete

title: Plan-and-Execute Streaming API
description: New SSE route to plan tasks and stream execution progress with heartbeat and abort handling.
items: API: /api/plan-and-execute with init/plan/progress/done/error/ping
Rate limiting via Supabase RPC
Tool selection and robust error handling
